trans-unit.source: Calculation over a dense representation, however, may leverage highly optimised vector operations and multithreading in BLAS, and tends to result in fewer CPU cache misses. So the sparsity should typically be quite high (10% non-zeros max, to be checked depending on the hardware) for the sparse input representation to be faster than the dense input representation on a machine with many CPUs and an optimized BLAS implementation.
trans-unit.target: 然而,在密集表示上的计算可能会利用BLAS中高度优化的向量运算和多线程,并且往往会导致较少的CPU缓存错过。所以稀疏度通常应该相当高(最大10%非零,要根据硬件情况进行检查),这样在一个有很多CPU和优化的BLAS实现的机器上,稀疏输入表示法才会比密集输入表示法快。

trans-unit.source: Calibrating a classifier consists in fitting a regressor (called a calibrator) that maps the output of the classifier (as given by predict or predict_proba) to a calibrated probability in [0, 1]. Denoting the output of the classifier for a given sample by \(f_i\), the calibrator tries to predict \(p(y_i = 1 | f_i)\).
trans-unit.target: 校准分类器在于安装回归器（称为校准器），该回归器将分类器的输出（由predict或predict_proba给出）映射到[0，1]中的已校准概率。校准器用\（f_i \）表示给定样本的分类器输出，它会尝试预测\（p（y_i = 1 | f_i）\）。

trans-unit.source: Calibration
trans-unit.target: Calibration

trans-unit.source: Calibration curves may also be referred to as reliability diagrams.
trans-unit.target: 校准曲线也可称为可靠性图。

trans-unit.source: Calibration of predicted probabilities.
trans-unit.target: 预测概率的校准;

trans-unit.source: Calibration of the probabilities of Gaussian naive Bayes with isotonic regression can fix this issue as can be seen from the nearly diagonal calibration curve. Sigmoid calibration also improves the brier score slightly, albeit not as strongly as the non-parametric isotonic calibration. This is an intrinsic limitation of sigmoid calibration, whose parametric form assumes a sigmoid rather than a transposed-sigmoid curve. The non-parametric isotonic calibration model, however, makes no such strong assumptions and can deal with either shape, provided that there is sufficient calibration data. In general, sigmoid calibration is preferable in cases where the calibration curve is sigmoid and where there is limited calibration data, while isotonic calibration is preferable for non-sigmoid calibration curves and in situations where large amounts of data are available for calibration.
trans-unit.target: 用等差回归校准高斯奈夫贝叶斯的概率可以解决这个问题,从近乎对角线的校准曲线可以看出。Sigmoid校准也能略微改善brier得分,尽管不如非参数等差校准那么强烈。这是sigmoid校准的内在局限性,其参数形式假设的是一个sigmoid而不是一个转置-sigmoid曲线。而非参数化的等调校准模型则不做如此强烈的假设,只要有足够的校准数据,就可以处理任何一种形状。一般来说,在校准曲线为sigmoid和校准数据有限的情况下,最好采用sigmoid校准,而在非sigmoid校准曲线和有大量数据可供校准的情况下,最好采用等调校准。

trans-unit.source: Calibration of the probabilities of Gaussian naive Bayes with isotonic regression can fix this issue as can be seen from the nearly diagonal calibration curve. Sigmoid calibration also improves the brier score slightly, albeit not as strongly as the non-parametric isotonic regression. This can be attributed to the fact that we have plenty of calibration data such that the greater flexibility of the non-parametric model can be exploited.
trans-unit.target: 用等差回归校准高斯奈夫贝叶斯的概率可以解决这个问题,从近似对角线的校准曲线可以看出。Sigmoid校准也能略微改善brier得分,尽管没有非参数等差回归那么强烈。这可以归因于我们有大量的校准数据,从而可以利用非参数模型的更大灵活性。

trans-unit.source: Calling fit on the pipeline is the same as calling fit on each estimator in turn, transform the input and pass it on to the next step. The pipeline has all the methods that the last estimator in the pipeline has, i.e. if the last estimator is a classifier, the Pipeline can be used as a classifier. If the last estimator is a transformer, again, so is the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 调用 fit 的管道与调用 fit 于依次对每个估计， transform 输入和传递给下一个步骤。管道具有管道中最后一个估计器具有的所有方法，即，如果最后一个估计器是一个分类器，则可以将 Pipeline 用作分类器。如果最后一个估计器是一个变压器，那么管道也是。

trans-unit.source: Certain input configurations can lead to singular weight matrices, for example when more than two points in the dataset are identical, or when the data is split into disjointed groups. In this case, solver='arpack' will fail to find the null space. The easiest way to address this is to use solver='dense' which will work on a singular matrix, though it may be very slow depending on the number of input points. Alternatively, one can attempt to understand the source of the singularity: if it is due to disjoint sets, increasing n_neighbors may help. If it is due to identical points in the dataset, removing these points may help.
trans-unit.target: 某些输入配置会导致奇异的权重矩阵，例如，当数据集中的两个以上点相同时，或者将数据拆分为不相交的组时。在这种情况下， solver='arpack' 将无法找到空空间。解决此问题的最简单方法是使用 solver='dense' ，它将在奇异矩阵上运行，尽管它可能会很慢，具体取决于输入点的数量。或者，可以尝试理解奇异性的来源：如果是由于不相交集，则增加 n_neighbors 可能会有所帮助。如果是由于数据集中的相同点，则删除这些点可能会有所帮助。

trans-unit.source: Check if y is in a multilabel format.
trans-unit.target: 检查 y 是否为多标签格式。

trans-unit.source: Check if estimator adheres to scikit-learn conventions.
trans-unit.target: 检查估算器是否符合scikit-learn约定。

trans-unit.source: Check that memory is joblib.Memory-like.
trans-unit.target: 检查 memory 是否为joblib.Memory类。

trans-unit.source: Check that all arrays have consistent first dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 检查所有数组的第一维度是否一致。

trans-unit.source: Checking scikit-learn compatibility of an estimator
trans-unit.target: 检查估算器的scikit-learn兼容性

trans-unit.source: Checking the variability of the coefficients
trans-unit.target: 检查系数的变异性

trans-unit.source: Checks X and y for consistent length, enforces X 2d and y 1d. Standard input checks are only applied to y, such as checking that y does not have np.nan or np.inf targets. For multi-label y, set multi_output=True to allow 2d and sparse y. If the dtype of X is object, attempt converting to float, raising on failure.
trans-unit.target: 检查 X 和 y 的长度是否一致,执行 X 2d 和 y 1d。标准的输入检查只适用于y,例如检查y没有np.nan或np.inf目标。对于多标签的y,设置multi_output=True,允许2d和稀疏的y。如果X的dtype是object,尝试转换为float,失败时引发。

trans-unit.source: Checks X and y for consistent length, enforces X to be 2D and y 1D. By default, X is checked to be non-empty and containing only finite values. Standard input checks are also applied to y, such as checking that y does not have np.nan or np.inf targets. For multi-label y, set multi_output=True to allow 2D and sparse y. If the dtype of X is object, attempt converting to float, raising on failure.
trans-unit.target: 检查X和y的长度是否一致,强制X为2D,y为1D。默认情况下,X被检查为非空,并且只包含有限的值。标准的输入检查也适用于y,例如检查y没有np.nan或np.inf目标。对于多标签的y,设置multi_output=True,允许2D和稀疏的y,如果X的dtype是object,则尝试转换为float,失败时引发。

trans-unit.source: Checks consistent length, passes through None, and ensures that everything can be indexed by converting sparse matrices to csr and converting non-interable objects to arrays.
trans-unit.target: 检查一致的长度,通过None,并通过将稀疏矩阵转换为csr和将非交互对象转换为数组来确保一切都可以被索引。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the estimator is fitted by verifying the presence of “all_or_any” of the passed attributes and raises a NotFittedError with the given message.
trans-unit.target: 通过验证所传递属性的“ all_or_any”是否存在来检查估计量是否合适，并使用给定消息引发NotFittedError。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the estimator is fitted by verifying the presence of fitted attributes (ending with a trailing underscore) and otherwise raises a NotFittedError with the given message.
trans-unit.target: 通过验证拟合属性的存在(以尾部的下划线结尾)来检查估计器是否拟合,否则会用给定的消息引发NotFittedError。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether all objects in arrays have the same shape or length.
trans-unit.target: 检查数组中所有对象是否具有相同的形状或长度。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the estimator’s fit method supports the given parameter.
trans-unit.target: 检查估计器的fit方法是否支持给定参数。

trans-unit.source: Chen et al. proposed an improvement of the Ledoit-Wolf shrinkage parameter, the OAS coefficient, whose convergence is significantly better under the assumption that the data are Gaussian.
trans-unit.target: Chen等人提出了Ledoit-Wolf收缩参数的改进,即OAS系数,在数据为高斯的假设下,其收敛性明显更好。

trans-unit.source: Chen et al., “Shrinkage Algorithms for MMSE Covariance Estimation”, IEEE Trans. on Sign. Proc., Volume 58, Issue 10, October 2010.
trans-unit.target: Chen等人，“ MMSE协方差估计的收缩算法”，IEEE Trans。在标志上。Proc。，第58卷，第10期，2010年10月。

trans-unit.source: Chi-squared stats of non-negative features for classification tasks.
trans-unit.target: 分类任务的非负性特征的Chi平方统计。

trans-unit.source: Chins, Situps and Jumps.
trans-unit.target: 下巴、仰卧起坐和跳跃。

trans-unit.source: Chong Wang, John Paisley, 2013
trans-unit.target: 王翀,John Paisley,2013年

trans-unit.source: Choosing max_features < n_features leads to a reduction of variance and an increase in bias.
trans-unit.target: 选择 max_features < n_features 会导致方差减少和偏差增加。

trans-unit.source: Choosing the amount of shrinkage, \(\alpha\) amounts to setting a bias/variance trade-off, and is discussed below.
trans-unit.target: 选择收缩量/(α/α/)相当于设定一个偏差/变异的权衡,下面将讨论这个问题。

trans-unit.source: Choosing the parameters of the model
trans-unit.target: 选择模型的参数

trans-unit.source: Choosing the right cross-validation object is a crucial part of fitting a model properly. There are many ways to split data into training and test sets in order to avoid model overfitting, to standardize the number of groups in test sets, etc.
trans-unit.target: 选择合适的交叉验证对象是正确拟合模型的关键部分。为了避免模型过拟合,将数据分成训练集和测试集,为了规范测试集的组数等,有很多方法。

trans-unit.source: Choosing the right estimator
trans-unit.target: 选择正确的估算器

trans-unit.source: Clamping factor.
trans-unit.target: 夹紧系数。

trans-unit.source: Clamping factor. A value in (0, 1) that specifies the relative amount that an instance should adopt the information from its neighbors as opposed to its initial label. alpha=0 means keeping the initial label information; alpha=1 means replacing all initial information.
trans-unit.target: 钳制因子。(0,1)中的一个值,它指定了一个实例相对于它的初始标签而言,应该采用邻居的信息的相对量,α=0表示保留初始标签信息;α=1表示替换所有初始信息。

trans-unit.source: Clamping factor. A value in [0, 1] that specifies the relative amount that an instance should adopt the information from its neighbors as opposed to its initial label. alpha=0 means keeping the initial label information; alpha=1 means replacing all initial information.
trans-unit.target: 钳制因子。在[0,1]中的一个值,它指定了一个实例相对于它的初始标签而言,应该采用邻居的信息的相对数量,α=0表示保留初始标签信息;α=1表示替换所有初始信息。

trans-unit.source: Class MLPClassifier implements a multi-layer perceptron (MLP) algorithm that trains using Backpropagation.
trans-unit.target: 类 MLPClassifier 实现了使用列车的多层感知器（MLP）算法反向传播。

trans-unit.source: Class MLPRegressor implements a multi-layer perceptron (MLP) that trains using backpropagation with no activation function in the output layer, which can also be seen as using the identity function as activation function. Therefore, it uses the square error as the loss function, and the output is a set of continuous values.
trans-unit.target: MLPRegressor 类实现了多层感知器（MLP），该感知器使用反向传播进行训练，而输出层中没有激活函数，也可以将其视为将身份函数用作激活函数。因此，它将平方误差用作损失函数，并且输出是一组连续值。

trans-unit.source: Class Distribution
trans-unit.target: 班级分布

trans-unit.source: Class Distribution:
trans-unit.target: 班级分布。

trans-unit.source: Class balanced accuracy as described in [Mosley2013]: the minimum between the precision and the recall for each class is computed. Those values are then averaged over the total number of classes to get the balanced accuracy.
trans-unit.target: [Mosley2013]中所述的类平衡精度：计算每个类的精度和召回率之间的最小值。然后，将这些值在总类数上取平均值，以获得平衡的准确性。

trans-unit.source: Classes across all calls to partial_fit. Can be obtained via np.unique(y_all), where y_all is the target vector of the entire dataset. This argument is required for the first call to partial_fit and can be omitted in the subsequent calls. Note that y doesn’t need to contain all labels in classes.
trans-unit.target: 所有对partial_fit的调用中的类。可以通过 np.unique(y_all) 获得，其中y_all是整个数据集的目标向量。第一次调用partial_fit时需要此参数，在随后的调用中可以将其省略。注意y不需要在 classes 包含所有标签。

trans-unit.source: Classes are not always linearly separable in feature space. The solution is to build a decision function that is not linear but may be polynomial instead. This is done using the kernel trick that can be seen as creating a decision energy by positioning kernels on observations:
trans-unit.target: 在要素空间中，类并非总是线性可分离的。解决方案是建立一个决策函数，该决策函数不是线性的，而是可以是多项式的。这是使用内核技巧完成的，该技巧可以看作是通过将内核置于观察值上来创建决策能量：

trans-unit.source: Classes included in this module are PLSRegressionPLSCanonical, CCA and PLSSVD
trans-unit.target: 此模块中包含的类是 PLSRegression PLSCanonical ， CCA 和 PLSSVD

trans-unit.target: Classification

trans-unit.source: Classification error for each estimator in the boosted ensemble.
trans-unit.target: 提升集合中每个估计器的分类误差。

trans-unit.source: Classification metrics
trans-unit.target: 分类指标

trans-unit.source: Classification of text documents using sparse features
trans-unit.target: 利用稀疏特征对文本文档进行分类

trans-unit.source: Classification pipeline
trans-unit.target: 分类管道

trans-unit.source: Classification with more than 2 classes requires the induction of n_classes regression trees at each iteration, thus, the total number of induced trees equals n_classes * n_estimators. For datasets with a large number of classes we strongly recommend to use HistGradientBoostingClassifier as an alternative to GradientBoostingClassifier .
trans-unit.target: 具有超过2个类的分类需要在每次迭代中归纳 n_classes 个回归树，因此，诱导树的总数等于 n_classes * n_estimators 。对于具有大量类的数据集，强烈建议使用 HistGradientBoostingClassifier 替代 GradientBoostingClassifier 。

trans-unit.source: Classification with more than 2 classes requires the induction of n_classes regression trees at each iteration, thus, the total number of induced trees equals n_classes * n_estimators. For datasets with a large number of classes we strongly recommend to use RandomForestClassifier as an alternative to GradientBoostingClassifier .
trans-unit.target: 具有2个以上类别的分类需要在每次迭代中归纳 n_classes 个回归树，因此，诱导树的总数等于 n_classes * n_estimators 。对于具有大量类的数据集，强烈建议使用 RandomForestClassifier 替代 GradientBoostingClassifier 。

trans-unit.source: Classifier Chain
trans-unit.target: 分级链

trans-unit.source: Classifier chains (see ClassifierChain) are a way of combining a number of binary classifiers into a single multi-label model that is capable of exploiting correlations among targets.
trans-unit.target: 分类器链（请参阅 ClassifierChain ）是一种将多个二进制分类器组合到单个多标签模型中的方法，该模型能够利用目标之间的相关性。

trans-unit.source: Classifier comparison
trans-unit.target: 分类器比较

trans-unit.source: Classifier implementing a vote among neighbors within a given radius
trans-unit.target: 分类器,实现在给定半径内的邻居之间的投票。

trans-unit.source: Classifier implementing the k-nearest neighbors vote.
trans-unit.target: 分类器实现k-最近邻投票。

trans-unit.source: Classifier using Ridge regression.
trans-unit.target: 使用Ridge回归的分类器。

trans-unit.source: Classifiers with custom kernels behave the same way as any other classifiers, except that:
trans-unit.target: 使用自定义内核的分类器与其他分类器的行为方式相同,除了。

trans-unit.source: Classifies each output independently rather than chaining.
trans-unit.target: 对每个输出进行独立分类,而不是链式分类。

trans-unit.source: Classify all data as inliers or outliers by calculating the residuals to the estimated model (base_estimator.predict(X) - y) - all data samples with absolute residuals smaller than the residual_threshold are considered as inliers.
trans-unit.target: 通过计算估计模型的残差（ base_estimator.predict(X) - y ）将所有数据分类为离群值或离群值-绝对残差小于 residual_threshold 阈值的所有数据样本均被视为离群值。

trans-unit.source: Classifying irises:
trans-unit.target: 虹膜的分类。

trans-unit.source: Claudio Gentile. A New Approximate Maximal Margin Classification Algorithm. NIPS. 2000.
trans-unit.target: Claudio Gentile.A New Approximate Maximal Margin Classification Algorithm.A New Approximate Maximal Margin Classification Algorithm.NIPS.2000.

trans-unit.source: Clearly the order of the chain is important. The first model in the chain has no information about the other labels while the last model in the chain has features indicating the presence of all of the other labels. In general one does not know the optimal ordering of the models in the chain so typically many randomly ordered chains are fit and their predictions are averaged together.
trans-unit.target: 显然,链的顺序很重要。链中的第一个模型没有关于其他标签的信息,而链中的最后一个模型具有表明所有其他标签存在的特征。一般来说,人们不知道链中模型的最佳排序,所以通常会拟合许多随机排序的链,并将它们的预测结果平均在一起。

trans-unit.source: Click on any estimator in the chart below to see its documentation.
trans-unit.target: 点击下图中的任何一个估算器都可以看到它的文档。

trans-unit.source: Clone does a deep copy of the model in an estimator without actually copying attached data. It yields a new estimator with the same parameters that has not been fit on any data.
trans-unit.target: 克隆在估计器中对模型进行深度复制,而不实际复制附加数据。它产生了一个新的估计器,其参数相同,但没有对任何数据进行拟合。

trans-unit.source: Cluster centers (if affinity != precomputed).
trans-unit.target: 聚类中心（如果亲和力= precomputed ）。

trans-unit.source: Cluster labels for each point in the dataset given to fit(). Noisy samples and points which are not included in a leaf cluster of cluster_hierarchy_ are labeled as -1.
trans-unit.target: 赋予fit（）的数据集中每个点的聚类标签。 cluster_hierarchy_ 的叶群集中未包含的嘈杂样本和点被标记为-1。

trans-unit.source: Cluster labels for each point in the dataset given to fit(). Noisy samples are given the label -1.
trans-unit.target: 给予fit()的数据集中每个点的簇标签。噪声样本的标签为-1。

trans-unit.source: Cluster labels for each point.
trans-unit.target: 每个点的聚类标签。

trans-unit.source: Cluster labels to evaluate
trans-unit.target: 聚类标签评估

trans-unit.source: Cluster labels.
trans-unit.target: 聚类标签。

trans-unit.source: Cluster labels. Noisy samples are given the label -1.
trans-unit.target: 聚类标签。噪声样本被赋予标签-1。

trans-unit.source: Cluster quality metrics evaluated (see Clustering performance evaluation for definitions and discussions of the metrics):
trans-unit.target: 评估群集质量指标（请参阅群集性能评估以了解指标的定义和讨论）：

trans-unit.source: Clustering
trans-unit.target: Clustering

trans-unit.source: Clustering can be expensive, especially when our dataset contains millions of datapoints. Many clustering algorithms are not inductive and so cannot be directly applied to new data samples without recomputing the clustering, which may be intractable. Instead, we can use clustering to then learn an inductive model with a classifier, which has several benefits:
trans-unit.target: 聚类可能会很昂贵，尤其是当我们的数据集包含数百万个数据点时。许多聚类算法不是归纳算法，因此如果不重新计算聚类，就无法将其直接应用于新数据样本，这可能是棘手的。相反，我们可以使用聚类然后使用分类器学习归纳模型，这有几个好处：

trans-unit.source: Clustering in general and KMeans, in particular, can be seen as a way of choosing a small number of exemplars to compress the information. The problem is sometimes known as vector quantization. For instance, this can be used to posterize an image:
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，尤其是KMeans，聚类可以看作是选择少量样本来压缩信息的一种方式。这个问题有时被称为矢量量化。例如，这可以用于后代图像：

trans-unit.source: Clustering metrics
trans-unit.target: 聚类指标

trans-unit.source: Clustering text documents using k-means
trans-unit.target: 使用k-means对文本文档进行聚类处理。

trans-unit.source: Clustering: grouping observations together
trans-unit.target: 聚类:将观测值分组

trans-unit.source: Clusters are then extracted using a DBSCAN-like method (cluster_method = ‘dbscan’) or an automatic technique proposed in [1] (cluster_method = ‘xi’).
trans-unit.target: 然后使用类DBSCAN方法（cluster_method ='dbscan'）或[1]中提出的自动技术（cluster_method ='xi'）提取聚类。

trans-unit.source: Clusters rows and columns of an array X to solve the relaxed normalized cut of the bipartite graph created from X as follows: the edge between row vertex i and column vertex j has weight X[i, j].
trans-unit.target: 聚类数组 X 的行和列，以解决由 X 创建的二部图的松弛归一化割，如下所示：行顶点 i 和列顶点 j 之间的边的权重 X[i, j] 。

trans-unit.source: Clusters that include samples from different classes do not make for an homogeneous labeling:
trans-unit.target: 包括来自不同类的样本的聚类,并不能使其成为同质的标签。

trans-unit.source: Clusters that include samples from totally different classes totally destroy the homogeneity of the labeling, hence:
trans-unit.target: 包括来自完全不同类的样本的聚类,完全破坏了标签的同质性,因此。

trans-unit.source: Coding method is determined by the object parameter transform_algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 编码方法由对象参数 transform_algorithm 确定。

trans-unit.source: Coefficient in the convex combination used for the computation of the shrunk estimate.
trans-unit.target: 用于计算缩减估计的凸组合中的系数。

trans-unit.source: Coefficient in the convex combination used for the computation of the shrunk estimate. Range is [0, 1].
trans-unit.target: 用于计算缩减估计的凸组合中的系数。范围是[0,1]。

trans-unit.source: Coefficient of the features in the decision function.
trans-unit.target: 决策函数中特征的系数。

trans-unit.source: Coefficients
trans-unit.target: Coefficients

trans-unit.source: Coefficients along the path
trans-unit.target: 沿途系数

trans-unit.source: Coefficients along the path.
trans-unit.target: 沿途的系数。

trans-unit.source: Coefficients for SVs of class 0
trans-unit.target: 0级SV的系数。

trans-unit.source: Coefficients for SVs of class 1
trans-unit.target: 1级SV的系数。

trans-unit.source: Coefficients for SVs of class 2
trans-unit.target: 2级SV的系数。

trans-unit.source: Coefficients in multivariate linear models represent the dependency between a given feature and the target, conditional on the other features.
trans-unit.target: 多元线性模型中的系数表示给定特征与目标之间的依存关系，其条件是其他特征。

trans-unit.source: Coefficients must be scaled to the same unit of measure to retrieve feature importance. Scaling them with the standard-deviation of the feature is a useful proxy.
trans-unit.target: 系数必须缩放到相同的度量单位,以检索特征重要性。用特征的标准差对其进行缩放是一个有用的代理。

trans-unit.source: Coefficients of the OMP solution. If return_path=True, this contains the whole coefficient path. In this case its shape is (n_features, n_features) or (n_features, n_targets, n_features) and iterating over the last axis yields coefficients in increasing order of active features.
trans-unit.target: OMP解决方案的系数。如果 return_path=True ，则包含整个系数路径。在这种情况下，其形状为（n_features，n_features）或（n_features，n_targets，n_features），并且在最后一个轴上进行迭代会按活动特征的递增顺序生成系数。

trans-unit.source: Coefficients of the regression model (mean of distribution)
trans-unit.target: 回归模型的系数(分布平均值)

trans-unit.source: Coefficients of the regression model (median of distribution).
trans-unit.target: 回归模型的系数(分布的中位数)。

trans-unit.source: Coefficients of the support vector in the decision function.
trans-unit.target: 决策函数中支持向量的系数。

trans-unit.source: Coefficients of the support vector in the decision function. For multiclass, coefficient for all 1-vs-1 classifiers. The layout of the coefficients in the multiclass case is somewhat non-trivial. See the section about multi-class classification in the SVM section of the User Guide for details.
trans-unit.target: 决策函数中支持向量的系数。对于多类,所有1vs1分类器的系数。在多类情况下,系数的布局有些不简单。详见《用户指南》中SVM部分关于多类分类的章节。

trans-unit.source: Coefficients of the support vectors in the decision function.
trans-unit.target: 决策函数中支持向量的系数。

trans-unit.source: Cohen’s kappa: a statistic that measures inter-annotator agreement.
trans-unit.target: 科恩的kappa：一种用于度量注释者之间协议的统计数据。

trans-unit.source: Colin Powell
trans-unit.target: Colin Powell

trans-unit.source: Color
trans-unit.target: Color

trans-unit.source: Color Quantization using K-Means
trans-unit.target: 使用K-Means的色彩量化技术

trans-unit.source: Color intensity
trans-unit.target: 颜色强度

trans-unit.source: Colormap recognized by matplotlib.
trans-unit.target: matplotlib识别的Colormap。

trans-unit.source: Colour Intensity:
trans-unit.target: 颜色强度。

trans-unit.source: Column 11 is a quantitative measure of disease progression one year after baseline
trans-unit.target: 第11栏是对基线一年后疾病进展的定量测量。

trans-unit.source: Column Transformer with Heterogeneous Data Sources
trans-unit.target: 带有异构数据源的列式变换器。

trans-unit.source: Column Transformer with Mixed Types
trans-unit.target: 混合型柱式变压器

trans-unit.source: Column partition labels.
trans-unit.target: 栏目分区标签。

trans-unit.source: Columns which only contained missing values at fit are discarded upon transform if strategy is not “constant”.
trans-unit.target: 如果策略不是“恒定的” ，则仅包含 fit 丢失值的列在 transform 时将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Columns which only contained missing values at fit are discarded upon transform if strategy is not “constant”.
trans-unit.target: 如果策略不是“恒定的” ，则仅包含 fit 丢失值的列在 transform 时将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Combine predictors using stacking
trans-unit.target: 使用堆叠法组合预测因子

trans-unit.source: Combined with a nearest neighbors classifier (KNeighborsClassifier), NCA is attractive for classification because it can naturally handle multi-class problems without any increase in the model size, and does not introduce additional parameters that require fine-tuning by the user.
trans-unit.target: 与最近的邻居分类器（ KNeighborsClassifier ）结合使用时，NCA对于分类很有吸引力，因为它可以自然地处理多类问题，而无需增加模型大小，并且不会引入需要用户进行微调的其他参数。

trans-unit.source: Combining features using this transformer has the benefit that it allows cross validation and grid searches over the whole process.
trans-unit.target: 使用这种变压器组合特征的好处是,它可以在整个过程中进行交叉验证和网格搜索。

trans-unit.source: Combining the display objects into a single plot
trans-unit.target: 将显示对象组合成一个情节

trans-unit.source: Comment
trans-unit.target: Comment

trans-unit.source: Comment to insert at the top of the file. This should be either a Unicode string, which will be encoded as UTF-8, or an ASCII byte string. If a comment is given, then it will be preceded by one that identifies the file as having been dumped by scikit-learn. Note that not all tools grok comments in SVMlight files.
trans-unit.target: 在文件顶部插入的注释。这个注释应该是Unicode字符串(将被编码为UTF-8)或者ASCII字节字符串。如果给定了注释,那么它将在前面加上一个标识文件已经被scikit-learn转储的注释。注意,并不是所有的工具都能在SVMlight文件中找到注释。

trans-unit.source: Common measures of impurity are Gini
trans-unit.target: 衡量不纯洁度的常用指标有:吉尼

trans-unit.source: Common pitfalls in interpretation of coefficients of linear models
trans-unit.target: 线性模型系数解释的常见陷阱

trans-unit.source: Compact estimator representations
trans-unit.target: 紧凑的估计器表示法

trans-unit.source: Compare BIRCH and MiniBatchKMeans
trans-unit.target: 比较BIRCH和MiniBatchKMeans。

trans-unit.source: Compare Stochastic learning strategies for MLPClassifier
trans-unit.target: 比较MLPClassifier的随机学习策略。

trans-unit.source: Compare cross decomposition methods
trans-unit.target: 比较交叉分解方法

trans-unit.source: Compare fit times with and without early stopping
trans-unit.target: 比较有无提前停车的配合时间

trans-unit.source: Compare randomized search and grid search for optimizing hyperparameters of a linear SVM with SGD training. All parameters that influence the learning are searched simultaneously (except for the number of estimators, which poses a time / quality tradeoff).
trans-unit.target: 比较随机搜索和网格搜索,以优化线性SVM的超参数与SGD训练。所有影响学习的参数都是同时搜索的(除了估计器的数量,这构成了时间/质量的折衷)。

trans-unit.source: Compare randomized search and grid search for optimizing hyperparameters of a random forest. All parameters that influence the learning are searched simultaneously (except for the number of estimators, which poses a time / quality tradeoff).
trans-unit.target: 比较随机搜索和网格搜索对随机森林超参数的优化。所有影响学习的参数都会被同时搜索(除了估计器的数量,这构成了时间/质量的权衡)。

trans-unit.source: Compare scores with and without early stopping
trans-unit.target: 比较有和没有提前停止的分数

trans-unit.source: Compare the effect of different scalers on data with outliers
trans-unit.target: 比较不同标尺对有离群值的数据的影响。

trans-unit.source: Compared are the estimated probability using a Gaussian naive Bayes classifier without calibration, with a sigmoid calibration, and with a non-parametric isotonic calibration. One can observe that only the non-parametric model is able to provide a probability calibration that returns probabilities close to the expected 0.5 for most of the samples belonging to the middle cluster with heterogeneous labels. This results in a significantly improved Brier score.
trans-unit.target: 比较的是使用高斯奈夫贝叶斯分类器在没有校准的情况下,使用sigmoid校准和使用非参数同位素校准的估计概率。可以观察到,只有非参数模型能够提供一个概率校准,对于大多数属于异质标签的中间簇的样本,返回的概率接近预期的0.5。这使得Brier得分得到了显著的提高。

trans-unit.source: Compared to metrics such as the subset accuracy, the Hamming loss, or the F1 score, ROC doesn’t require optimizing a threshold for each label.
trans-unit.target: 与子集准确性，汉明损失或F1得分等指标相比，ROC不需要为每个标签优化阈值。

trans-unit.source: Compared to metrics such as the subset accuracy, the Hamming loss, or the F1 score, ROC doesn’t require optimizing a threshold for each label. The roc_auc_score function can also be used in multi-class classification, if the predicted outputs have been binarized.
trans-unit.target: 与子集准确性，汉明损失或F1得分等指标相比，ROC不需要为每个标签优化阈值。该 roc_auc_score 功能也可以在多类分类中使用，如果预测的输出已被二值化。

trans-unit.source: Compared to the OLS (ordinary least squares) estimator, the Theil-Sen estimator is robust against outliers. It has a breakdown point of about 29.3% in case of a simple linear regression which means that it can tolerate arbitrary corrupted data (outliers) of up to 29.3% in the two-dimensional case.
trans-unit.target: 与OLS(普通最小二乘法)估计器相比,Theil-Sen估计器对离群值的影响很大。在简单线性回归的情况下,它的故障点约为29.3%,这意味着在二维情况下,它可以容忍高达29.3%的任意损坏数据(离群值)。

trans-unit.source: Compared to the OLS (ordinary least squares) estimator, the coefficient weights are slightly shifted toward zeros, which stabilises them.
trans-unit.target: 与OLS(普通最小二乘法)估计器相比,系数权重略微向零移动,使其趋于稳定。

trans-unit.source: Compared with the ranking loss, NDCG can take into account relevance scores, rather than a ground-truth ranking. So if the ground-truth consists only of an ordering, the ranking loss should be preferred; if the ground-truth consists of actual usefulness scores (e.g. 0 for irrelevant, 1 for relevant, 2 for very relevant), NDCG can be used.
trans-unit.target: 与排名损失相比,NDCG可以考虑相关性分数,而不是地面真实的排名。因此,如果地面真相只由排序组成,应优先考虑排序损失;如果地面真相由实际有用性分数组成(如0代表不相关,1代表相关,2代表非常相关),则可以使用NDCG。

trans-unit.source: Comparison of the sparsity (percentage of zero coefficients) of solutions when L1 and L2 penalty are used for different values of C. We can see that large values of C give more freedom to the model. Conversely, smaller values of C constrain the model more. In the L1 penalty case, this leads to sparser solutions.
trans-unit.target: 对不同的C值采用L1和L2惩罚时,解的稀疏度(零系数的百分比)进行比较,我们可以看到,大的C值给了模型更大的自由度。反之,较小的C值对模型的约束更大。在L1惩罚的情况下,会导致解比较稀疏。

trans-unit.source: Comparison of the sparsity (percentage of zero coefficients) of solutions when L1, L2 and Elastic-Net penalty are used for different values of C. We can see that large values of C give more freedom to the model. Conversely, smaller values of C constrain the model more. In the L1 penalty case, this leads to sparser solutions. As expected, the Elastic-Net penalty sparsity is between that of L1 and L2.
trans-unit.target: 对不同的C值采用L1、L2和弹性网惩罚时,解的稀疏度(零系数百分比)进行比较,可以看出,C值大,模型的自由度就大。反之,较小的C值对模型的约束更大。在L1惩罚的情况下,这会导致更稀疏的解。正如预期的那样,Elastic-Net惩罚的稀疏性介于L1和L2之间。

trans-unit.source: Compute the Brier score. The smaller the Brier score, the better, hence the naming with “loss”. Across all items in a set N predictions, the Brier score measures the mean squared difference between (1) the predicted probability assigned to the possible outcomes for item i, and (2) the actual outcome. Therefore, the lower the Brier score is for a set of predictions, the better the predictions are calibrated. Note that the Brier score always takes on a value between zero and one, since this is the largest possible difference between a predicted probability (which must be between zero and one) and the actual outcome (which can take on values of only 0 and 1). The Brier loss is composed of refinement loss and calibration loss. The Brier score is appropriate for binary and categorical outcomes that can be structured as true or false, but is inappropriate for ordinal variables which can take on three or more values (this is because the Brier score assumes that all possible outcomes are equivalently “distant” from one another). Which label is considered to be the positive label is controlled via the parameter pos_label, which defaults to 1. Read more in the User Guide.
trans-unit.target: 计算Brier分数。 Brier分数越小越好，因此命名为“ loss”。在一组N个预测中的所有项目上，Brier分数测量（1）分配给项目i可能结果的预测概率与（2）实际结果之间的均方差。因此，一组预测的Brier分数越低，则对预测的校准就越好。请注意，Brier分数始终取0到1之间的值，因为这是预测概率（必须在0到1之间）和实际结果（只能取0到1）之间的最大可能差值。 ）。布里尔损失由精制损失和校准损失组成。 Brier分数适用于可构造为真或假的二元和分类结果，但是不适用于序数变量，因为序数变量可以采用三个或更多的值（这是因为Brier评分假设所有可能的结果都彼此“相等”）。哪个标签被视为肯定标签是通过参数pos_label（默认值为1）控制的。用户指南。

trans-unit.source: Computing Euclidean distances in this d-dimensional space is equivalent to first projecting the data points into \(H\), and computing the distances there (since the other dimensions will contribute equally to each class in terms of distance). In other words, if \(x\) is closest to \(\mu_k\) in the original space, it will also be the case in \(H\). This shows that, implicit in the LDA classifier, there is a dimensionality reduction by linear projection onto a \(K-1\) dimensional space.
trans-unit.target: 在这个四维空间中计算欧氏距离相当于首先将数据点投影到(H)中,然后在那里计算距离(因为其他维度对每一类的距离都有同等贡献)。换句话说,如果在原始空间中,如果\(x\)与\(\mu_k\)最接近,那么在\(H\)中也将是如此。这表明,在LDA分类器中,通过线性投影到一个/(K-1/)维度空间中,可以减少维度。

trans-unit.source: Connectivity constraints and single, complete or average linkage can enhance the ‘rich getting richer’ aspect of agglomerative clustering, particularly so if they are built with sklearn.neighbors.kneighbors_graph. In the limit of a small number of clusters, they tend to give a few macroscopically occupied clusters and almost empty ones. (see the discussion in Agglomerative clustering with and without structure). Single linkage is the most brittle linkage option with regard to this issue.
trans-unit.target: 连接性约束和单个，完整或平均链接可以增强聚集集群的“富人致富”方面，尤其是如果它们是使用 sklearn.neighbors.kneighbors_graph 构建的。在少数簇的限制下，它们倾向于给出一些宏观上占据的簇，而几乎是空的簇。 （请参阅带有和不带有结构的聚集聚类中的讨论）。就此问题而言，单联动是最脆弱的联动选项。

trans-unit.source: Connectivity matrix. Defines for each feature the neighboring features following a given structure of the data. This can be a connectivity matrix itself or a callable that transforms the data into a connectivity matrix, such as derived from kneighbors_graph. Default is None, i.e, the hierarchical clustering algorithm is unstructured.
trans-unit.target: 连接性矩阵。为每个特征定义给定数据结构后的相邻特征。这可以是一个连通性矩阵本身,也可以是一个将数据转换为连通性矩阵的可调用,比如从 kneighbors_graph 中导出。默认为None,即层次聚类算法是非结构化的。

trans-unit.source: Connectivity matrix. Defines for each sample the neighboring samples following a given structure of the data. trans-unit.source: Consider a data set of \(n\) observations from the same distribution described by \(p\) features. Consider now that we add one more observation to that data set. Is the new observation so different from the others that we can doubt it is regular? (i.e. does it come from the same distribution?) Or on the contrary, is it so similar to the other that we cannot distinguish it from the original observations? This is the question addressed by the novelty detection tools and methods.
trans-unit.target: 考虑一个数据集,其中有来自同一分布的由特征描述的观测值(n)。现在考虑我们向该数据集增加一个观测值。新的观测值是否与其他观测值如此不同,以至于我们可以怀疑它是有规律的?(即它是否来自相同的分布?)或者相反,它是否与其他观测值如此相似,以至于我们无法将其与原始观测值区分开来? 这就是新颖性检测工具和方法所要解决的问题。

trans-unit.source: Consider a three class problem with class 0 having three support vectors \(v^{0}_0, v^{1}_0, v^{2}_0\) and class 1 and 2 having two support vectors \(v^{0}_1, v^{1}_1\) and \(v^{0}_2, v^{1}_2\) respectively. For each support vector \(v^{j}_i\), there are two dual coefficients. Let’s call the coefficient of support vector \(v^{j}_i\) in the classifier between classes \(i\) and \(k\)\(\alpha^{j}_{i,k}\). Then dual_coef_ looks like this:

trans-unit.source: Contingency matrix (sklearn.metrics.cluster.contingency_matrix) reports the intersection cardinality for every true/predicted cluster pair. The contingency matrix provides sufficient statistics for all clustering metrics where the samples are independent and identically distributed and one doesn’t need to account for some instances not being clustered.
trans-unit.target: 列联矩阵（ sklearn.metrics.cluster.contingency_matrix ）报告每个真实/预测的聚类对的交集基数。权变矩阵为所有聚类指标提供了足够的统计数据，在这些度量中样本是独立的并且分布相同，并且不需要考虑某些未聚类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Contingency matrix is easy to interpret for a small number of clusters, but becomes very hard to interpret for a large number of clusters.
trans-unit.target: 或然矩阵对于少量的聚类很容易解释,但对于大量的聚类就很难解释了。

trans-unit.source: Contrary to inertia, ARI requires knowledge of the ground truth classes while is almost never available in practice or requires manual assignment by human annotators (as in the supervised learning setting).
trans-unit.target: 与惯性相反，ARI需要掌握地面真理类的知识，而在实践中几乎是不可用的，或者需要人工注释者手动分配（如在有监督的学习环境中）。

trans-unit.source: Contrary to inertia, FMI-based measures require the knowledge of the ground truth classes while almost never available in practice or requires manual assignment by human annotators (as in the supervised learning setting).
trans-unit.target: 与惯性相反，基于FMI的测度需要了解地面真相类别，而实际上却几乎不可用，或者需要人工注释者手动分配（如在有监督的学习环境中）。

trans-unit.source: Contrary to inertia, MI-based measures require the knowledge of the ground truth classes while almost never available in practice or requires manual assignment by human annotators (as in the supervised learning setting).
trans-unit.target: 与惯性相反，基于MI的度量要求了解地面真理类，而在实践中却几乎不可用，或者需要人工注释者手动分配（如在有监督的学习环境中）。

trans-unit.source: Contrary to the fit method, the first call to partial_fit needs to be passed the list of all the expected class labels.
trans-unit.target: 与 fit 方法相反，对 partial_fit 的第一次调用需要传递所有预期类标签的列表。

trans-unit.source: Control early stopping based on the consecutive number of mini batches that does not yield an improvement on the smoothed inertia.
trans-unit.target: 根据连续的小批数控制提前停车,对平滑的惯性没有产生改善。

trans-unit.source: Control early stopping based on the relative center changes as measured by a smoothed, variance-normalized of the mean center squared position changes. This early stopping heuristics is closer to the one used for the batch variant of the algorithms but induces a slight computational and memory overhead over the inertia heuristic.
trans-unit.target: 根据平均中心平方位置变化的平滑化、方差归一化所测得的相对中心变化来控制早期停车。这种提前停止的启发式算法更接近于用于算法的批量变体,但比惯性启发式算法诱发了轻微的计算和内存开销。

trans-unit.source: Control the fraction of the maximum number of counts for a center to be reassigned. A higher value means that low count centers are more easily reassigned, which means that the model will take longer to converge, but should converge in a better clustering.
trans-unit.target: 控制一个中心被重新分配的最大计数的分数。较高的值意味着低计数中心更容易被重新分配,这意味着模型将需要更长的时间来收敛,但应该在更好的聚类中收敛。

trans-unit.source: Control the pseudo random number generator used to generate the matrix at fit time. If int, random_state is the seed used by the random number generator; If RandomState instance, random_state is the random number generator; If None, the random number generator is the RandomState instance used by np.random.
trans-unit.target: 控制用于在拟合时间生成矩阵的伪随机数生成器。如果为int，则random_state是随机数生成器使用的种子；否则为false。如果是RandomState实例，则random_state是随机数生成器；如果没有，随机数生成器所使用的RandomState实例 np.random 。

trans-unit.source: Controls 3 sources of randomness:
trans-unit.target: 控制3个随机性来源。

trans-unit.source: Controls both the randomness of the bootstrapping of the samples used when building trees (if bootstrap=True) and the sampling of the features to consider when looking for the best split at each node (if max_features < n_features). See Glossary for details.
trans-unit.target: 控制在构建树时使用的示例的自举的随机性（如果 bootstrap=True ）和在每个节点上寻找最佳分割时要考虑的特征的采样（如果 max_features < n_features ）。有关详细信息，请参见词汇表。

trans-unit.source: Controls how tight natural clusters in the original space are in the embedded space and how much space will be between them. For larger values, the space between natural clusters will be larger in the embedded space. Again, the choice of this parameter is not very critical. If the cost function increases during initial optimization, the early exaggeration factor or the learning rate might be too high.
trans-unit.target: 控制原始空间中的自然簇在嵌入空间中的紧密程度,以及它们之间的空间会有多大。对于较大的数值,在嵌入空间中,自然簇之间的空间会更大。同样,这个参数的选择也不是很关键。如果在初始优化过程中,成本函数增加,那么早期的夸大因子或学习率可能会过高。

trans-unit.source: Controls output verbosity.
trans-unit.target: 控制输出啰嗦。

trans-unit.source: Controls the generation of the random y used to fit the trees and the draw of the splits for each feature at the trees’ nodes. See Glossary for details.
trans-unit.target: 控制用于拟合树木的随机 y 的生成，以及控制树木节点上每个要素的分割的绘制。有关详细信息，请参见词汇表。

trans-unit.source: Controls the generation of the random states for each repetition. Pass an int for reproducible output across multiple function calls. See Glossary.
trans-unit.target: 控制每次重复的随机状态的生成。为多个函数调用传递可重复输出的int值。请参阅词汇表。

trans-unit.source: Controls the number of jobs that get dispatched during parallel execution. Reducing this number can be useful to avoid an explosion of memory consumption when more jobs get dispatched than CPUs can process. This parameter can be:
trans-unit.target: 控制在并行执行期间调度的作业数量。当分派的作业数量多于CPU所能处理的数量时,减少这个数量可以有效避免内存消耗的爆炸。这个参数可以是

trans-unit.source: Controls the pseudo random number generation for shuffling the data for probability estimates. Ignored when probability is False. Pass an int for reproducible output across multiple function calls. See Glossary.
trans-unit.target: 控制伪随机数生成，以对数据进行混洗以进行概率估计。当 probability 为False时被忽略。为多个函数调用传递可重复输出的int值。请参阅词汇表。

trans-unit.source: Controls the pseudo random number generation for shuffling the data for the dual coordinate descent (if dual=True). When dual=False the underlying implementation of LinearSVC is not random and random_state has no effect on the results. Pass an int for reproducible output across multiple function calls. See Glossary.
trans-unit.target: 控制伪随机数生成，以对数据进行混洗以实现双坐标下降（如果 dual=True ）。当 dual=False 时， LinearSVC 的基础实现不是随机的， random_state 对结果没有影响。为多个函数调用传递可重复输出的int值。请参阅词汇表。

trans-unit.source: Controls the pseudo random number generation for shuffling the data. Pass an int for reproducible output across multiple function calls. See Glossary.
trans-unit.target: 控制伪随机数生成以对数据进行混洗。为多个函数调用传递可重复输出的int值。请参阅词汇表。

trans-unit.source: Controls the pseudo random number generator used to generate the projection matrix at fit time. Pass an int for reproducible output across multiple function calls. See Glossary.
trans-unit.target: 控制用于在拟合时间生成投影矩阵的伪随机数生成器。为多个函数调用传递可重复输出的int值。请参阅词汇表。

trans-unit.source: Controls the pseudo-randomness of the selection of the feature and split values for each branching step and each tree in the forest.
trans-unit.target: 控制森林中每个分支步骤和每棵树的特征值和分割值选择的伪随机性。

trans-unit.source: Controls the random resampling of the original dataset (sample wise and feature wise). If the base estimator accepts a random_state attribute, a different seed is generated for each instance in the ensemble. Pass an int for reproducible output across multiple function calls. See Glossary.
trans-unit.target: 控制原始数据集的随机重采样（明智的抽样和明智的抽样）。如果基本估算器接受 random_state 属性，则会为集合中的每个实例生成一个不同的种子。为多个函数调用传递可重复输出的int值。请参阅词汇表。

trans-unit.source: Controls the random seed given at each base_estimator at each boosting iteration. Thus, it is only used when base_estimator exposes a random_state. In addition, it controls the bootstrap of the weights used to train the base_estimator at each boosting iteration. Pass an int for reproducible output across multiple function calls. See Glossary.
trans-unit.target: 控制每次增强迭代时每个 base_estimator 给出的随机种子。因此，仅当 base_estimator 公开 random_state 时才使用它。此外，它还控制权重的自举，该权重用于在每次增强迭代时训练 base_estimator 。为多个函数调用传递可重复输出的int值。请参阅词汇表。

trans-unit.source: Controls the random seed given at each base_estimator at each boosting iteration. Thus, it is only used when base_estimator exposes a random_state. Pass an int for reproducible output across multiple function calls. See Glossary.
trans-unit.target: 控制每次增强迭代时每个 base_estimator 给出的随机种子。因此，仅当 base_estimator 公开 random_state 时才使用它。为多个函数调用传递可重复输出的int值。请参阅词汇表。

trans-unit.source: Controls the random seed given to each Tree estimator at each boosting iteration. In addition, it controls the random permutation of the features at each split (see Notes for more details). It also controls the random spliting of the training data to obtain a validation set if n_iter_no_change is not None. Pass an int for reproducible output across multiple function calls. See Glossary.
trans-unit.target: 控制每次增强迭代时分配给每个Tree估计量的随机种子。此外，它控制每个分割处特征的随机排列（有关更多详细信息，请参见“注释”）。如果 n_iter_no_change 不为None ，它还控制训练数据的随机拆分以获得验证集。为多个函数调用传递可重复输出的int值。请参阅词汇表。

trans-unit.source: Controls the random seed given to the method chosen to initialize the parameters (see init_params). In addition, it controls the generation of random samples from the fitted distribution (see the method sample). Pass an int for reproducible output across multiple function calls. See Glossary.
trans-unit.target: 控制分配给用于初始化参数的方法的随机种子（请参阅 init_params ）。此外，它控制拟合分布中随机样本的生成（请参见方法 sample ）。为多个函数调用传递可重复输出的int值。请参阅词汇表。

trans-unit.source: Controls the randomness of each repeated cross-validation instance. Pass an int for reproducible output across multiple function calls. See Glossary.
trans-unit.target: 控制每个重复的交叉验证实例的随机性。为多个函数调用传递可重复输出的int值。请参阅词汇表。

trans-unit.source: Controls the randomness of the estimator. The features are always randomly permuted at each split, even if splitter is set to "best". When max_features < n_features, the algorithm will select max_features at random at each split before finding the best split among them. But the best found split may vary across different runs, even if max_features=n_features. That is the case, if the improvement of the criterion is identical for several splits and one split has to be selected at random. To obtain a deterministic behaviour during fitting, random_state has to be fixed to an integer. See Glossary for details.
trans-unit.target: 控制估算器的随机性。即使 splitter 设置为 "best" ，也始终在每个拆分中随机排列功能。当 max_features < n_features ，算法将在每个分割处随机选择 max_features ，然后在其中找到最佳分割。但是，即使 max_features=n_features ，找到的最佳拆分也可能因不同的运行而有所不同。就是这种情况，如果对于几个分割而言标准的改进是相同的，并且必须随机选择一个分割。为了在拟合过程中获得确定性的行为， random_state 必须固定为整数。有关详细信息，请参见词汇表。

trans-unit.source: Controls the randomness of the training and testing indices produced. Pass an int for reproducible output across multiple function calls. See Glossary.
trans-unit.target: 控制所产生的训练和测试指标的随机性。为多个函数调用传递可重复输出的int值。请参阅词汇表。

trans-unit.source: Controls the randomness to generate the predictions when strategy='stratified' or strategy='uniform'. Pass an int for reproducible output across multiple function calls. See Glossary.
trans-unit.target: 当 strategy='stratified' 或 strategy='uniform' 时，控制随机性以生成预测。为多个函数调用传递可重复输出的int值。请参阅词汇表。

trans-unit.source: Controls the shuffling applied to the data before applying the split. Pass an int for reproducible output across multiple function calls. See Glossary.
trans-unit.target: 在应用拆分之前，控制应用于数据的改组。为多个函数调用传递可重复输出的int值。请参阅词汇表。

trans-unit.source: Controls the verbosity of the imputer.
trans-unit.target: 控制输入法的词性。

trans-unit.source: Controls the verbosity of the tree building process.
trans-unit.target: 控制建树过程的动词性。

trans-unit.source: Controls the verbosity when fitting and predicting.
trans-unit.target: 控制拟合和预测时的动词性。

trans-unit.source: Controls the verbosity: the higher, the more messages.
trans-unit.target: 控制语气:语气越高,信息越多。

trans-unit.source: Controls the verbosity; the higher, the more messages. Defaults to 0.
trans-unit.target: 控制啰嗦程度,越高,信息越多。默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: Controls verbosity of output.
trans-unit.target: 控制输出的语气。

trans-unit.source: Convenience and encapsulation
trans-unit.target: 便利和封装

trans-unit.source: Convenience function for simplified feature union construction.
trans-unit.target: 简化特征联盟构造的便利功能。

trans-unit.source: Convenience function for simplified pipeline construction.
trans-unit.target: 便利功能,简化管道施工。

trans-unit.source: Convenience method; equivalent to calling fit(X) followed by predict(X).
trans-unit.target: 方便的方法;相当于调用fit(X),然后再调用predict(X)。

trans-unit.source: Convenient way to get row and column indicators together.
trans-unit.target: 方便地将行指标和列指标放在一起。

trans-unit.source: Conventions
trans-unit.target: Conventions

trans-unit.source: Convergence tolerance for arpack. If 0, optimal value will be chosen by arpack.
trans-unit.target: arpack的收敛容忍度。如果为0,arpack将选择最佳值。

trans-unit.source: Convergence tolerance for the optimization.
trans-unit.target: 优化的收敛容忍度。

trans-unit.source: Convergence tolerance passed to arpack or lobpcg. not used if eigen_solver == ‘dense’.
trans-unit.target: 收敛容差传递给了arpack或lobpcg。如果eigen_solver =='dense'，则不使用。

trans-unit.source: Convergence tolerance: threshold to consider the system at steady state
trans-unit.target: 收敛容限:考虑系统处于稳定状态的阈值。

trans-unit.source: Convergence tolerance: threshold to consider the system at steady state.
trans-unit.target: 收敛容限:考虑系统处于稳定状态的阈值。

trans-unit.source: Convert a collection of raw documents to a matrix of TF-IDF features.
trans-unit.target: 将原始文档集合转换为TF-IDF特征的矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Convert a collection of text documents to a matrix of token counts
trans-unit.target: 将文本文档集合转换为标记计数矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Convert a collection of text documents to a matrix of token occurrences
trans-unit.target: 将文本文档集合转换为标记出现的矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Convert a raw name for a data set in a mldata.org filename.
trans-unit.target: 转换mldata.org文件名中数据集的原始名称。

trans-unit.source: Convert all characters to lowercase before tokenizing.
trans-unit.target: 在标记化之前,将所有字符转换为小写。

trans-unit.source: Convert coefficient matrix to dense array format.
trans-unit.target: 将系数矩阵转换为密集数组格式。

trans-unit.source: Convert coefficient matrix to sparse format.
trans-unit.target: 将系数矩阵转换为稀疏格式。

trans-unit.source: Convert the Reduced distance to the true distance.
trans-unit.target: 将缩短的距离转换为真实距离。

trans-unit.target: 将后面的数据转换为原始表示。

trans-unit.source: Convert the data back to the original representation.
trans-unit.target: 将数据转换回原始表示。

trans-unit.source: Convert the true distance to the reduced distance.
trans-unit.target: 将真实距离转换为缩小的距离。

trans-unit.source: Converts an array-like to an array of floats.
trans-unit.target: 将类数组转换为浮动数组。

trans-unit.source: Converts the coef_ member (back) to a numpy.ndarray. This is the default format of coef_ and is required for fitting, so calling this method is only required on models that have previously been sparsified; otherwise, it is a no-op.
trans-unit.target: 将 coef_ 成员（返回）转换为numpy.ndarray。这是 coef_ 的默认格式，并且是拟合所需的格式，因此仅在以前稀疏的模型上才需要调用此方法。否则，它是无操作的。

trans-unit.source: Converts the coef_ member to a scipy.sparse matrix, which for L1-regularized models can be much more memory- and storage-efficient than the usual numpy.ndarray representation.
trans-unit.target: 将 coef_ 成员转换为scipy.sparse矩阵，对于L1规范化的模型，该矩阵可以比通常的numpy.ndarray表示具有更高的内存和存储效率。

trans-unit.source: Coordinate descent is an algorithm that considers each column of data at a time hence it will automatically convert the X input as a Fortran-contiguous numpy array if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 坐标下降是一种每次考虑每列数据的算法,因此,如果需要的话,它会自动将X输入转换为Fortran-contiguous numpy数组。

trans-unit.target: 使用Rousseeuw和Van Driessen在[RVD]中建议的经验校正因子进行校正。

trans-unit.source: Correction using the empirical correction factor suggested by Rousseeuw and Van Driessen in [RVD].
trans-unit.target: 使用Rousseeuw和Van Driessen在[RVD]中建议的经验校正因子进行校正。

trans-unit.source: Correctness of Kruskal’s algorithms for monotone regression with ties Leeuw, Psychometrica, 1977
trans-unit.target: Kruskal的单调回归算法的正确性与联系Leeuw，Psychometrica，1977年

trans-unit.source: Correlated features induce instabilities in the coefficients of linear models and their effects cannot be well teased apart.
trans-unit.target: 相关特征会诱发线性模型系数的不稳定性,其影响无法很好地被挑明。

trans-unit.target: 在对样本进行评分时,破坏数据。

trans-unit.target: 余弦距离定义为1.0减去余弦相似度。

trans-unit.target: 余弦内核（ kernel = 'cosine' ）

trans-unit.target: 余弦相似度,或余弦核,计算相似度为X和Y的归一化点积。

trans-unit.source: Cross decomposition
trans-unit.target: 交叉分解

trans-unit.source: Cross decomposition algorithms find the fundamental relations between two matrices (X and Y). They are latent variable approaches to modeling the covariance structures in these two spaces. They will try to find the multidimensional direction in the X space that explains the maximum multidimensional variance direction in the Y space. PLS-regression is particularly suited when the matrix of predictors has more variables than observations, and when there is multicollinearity among X values. By contrast, standard regression will fail in these cases.
trans-unit.target: 交叉分解算法可以找到两个矩阵(X和Y)之间的基本关系。它们是对这两个空间的协方差结构进行建模的潜变量方法。它们将试图在X空间中找到解释Y空间中最大多维方差方向的多维方向。当预测因子矩阵的变量比观测值多,以及X值之间存在多线性时,PLS-回归特别适合。相比之下,标准回归在这些情况下会失败。

trans-unit.source: Cross validation iterators can also be used to directly perform model selection using Grid Search for the optimal hyperparameters of the model. This is the topic of the next section: Tuning the hyper-parameters of an estimator.
trans-unit.target: 交叉验证迭代器还可用于使用网格搜索直接执行模型选择，以获取模型的最佳超参数。这是下一部分的主题：调整估算器的超参数。

trans-unit.source: Cross-validation to set a parameter can be done more efficiently on an algorithm-by-algorithm basis. This is why, for certain estimators, scikit-learn exposes Cross-validation: evaluating estimator performance estimators that set their parameter automatically by cross-validation:
trans-unit.target: 可以在逐个算法的基础上更高效地完成交叉验证以设置参数。这就是为什么对于某些估计器，scikit-learn会显示交叉验证：评估通过交叉验证自动设置其参数的估计器性能估计器：

trans-unit.source: Cross-validation values for each alpha (if store_cv_values=True and cv=None). After fit() has been called, this attribute will contain the mean squared errors (by default) or the values of the {loss,score}_func function (if provided in the constructor).

trans-unit.source: Current default is ‘auto’ which uses 1 / n_features, if gamma='scale' is passed then it uses 1 / (n_features * X.std()) as value of gamma. The current default of gamma, ‘auto’, will change to ‘scale’ in version 0.22. ‘auto_deprecated’, a deprecated version of ‘auto’ is used as a default indicating that no explicit value of gamma was passed.
trans-unit.target: 当前默认值为'auto'，它使用1 / n_features，如果传递了 gamma='scale' ，则它将使用1 /（n_features * X.std（））作为gamma值。当前的伽玛默认值“ auto”在版本0.22中将更改为“ scale”。“ auto_deprecated”（已弃用的“ auto”版本）用作默认值，指示未传递任何明确的gamma值。

trans-unit.source: Current default is 'warn', which behaves as True in addition to raising a warning when a training score is looked up. That default will be changed to False in 0.21. Computing training scores is used to get insights on how different parameter settings impact the overfitting/underfitting trade-off. However computing the scores on the training set can be computationally expensive and is not strictly required to select the parameters that yield the best generalization performance.
trans-unit.target: 当前默认值为 'warn' ，除了在查找训练分数时发出警告外，其行为还为 True 。该默认值将在0.21中更改为 False 。计算培训分数用于了解不同的参数设置如何影响过拟合/欠拟合权衡。但是，在训练集上计算分数可能在计算上很昂贵，并且并非严格要求选择产生最佳泛化性能的参数。

trans-unit.source: Currently only those scorer functions that return a single score can be passed inside the dict. Scorer functions that return multiple values are not permitted and will require a wrapper to return a single metric:
trans-unit.target: 目前,只有那些返回单个分数的scorer函数可以在dict里面传递。不允许返回多个值的scorer函数,需要一个包装器来返回一个度量值。

trans-unit.source: Currently, MLPClassifier supports only the Cross-Entropy loss function, which allows probability estimates by running the predict_proba method.
trans-unit.target: 当前， MLPClassifier 仅支持交叉熵损失函数，该函数允许通过运行 predict_proba 方法进行概率估计。

trans-unit.source: Currently, algorithm = 'auto' selects 'brute' if \(k >= N/2\), the input data is sparse, or effective_metric_ isn’t in the VALID_METRICS list for either 'kd_tree' or 'ball_tree'. Otherwise, it selects the first out of 'kd_tree' and 'ball_tree' that has effective_metric_ in its VALID_METRICS list. This choice is based on the assumption that the number of query points is at least the same order as the number of training points, and that leaf_size is close to its default value of 30.
trans-unit.target: 目前， algorithm = 'auto' 选择 'brute' 如果\（K> = N / 2 \），输入数据是稀疏的，或者 effective_metric_ 不在 VALID_METRICS 列表要么 'kd_tree' 或 'ball_tree' 。否则，它会选择先出来的 'kd_tree' 和 'ball_tree' 有 effective_metric_ 在其 VALID_METRICS 列表。该选择基于以下假设：查询点的数量至少与训练点的数量相同，并且 leaf_size 接近其默认值 30 。

trans-unit.source: Currently, algorithm = 'auto' selects 'kd_tree' if \(k < N/2\) and the 'effective_metric_' is in the 'VALID_METRICS' list of 'kd_tree'. It selects 'ball_tree' if \(k < N/2\) and the 'effective_metric_' is in the 'VALID_METRICS' list of 'ball_tree'. It selects 'brute' if \(k < N/2\) and the 'effective_metric_' is not in the 'VALID_METRICS' list of 'kd_tree' or 'ball_tree'. It selects 'brute' if \(k >= N/2\). This choice is based on the assumption that the number of query points is at least the same order as the number of training points, and that leaf_size is close to its default value of 30.
trans-unit.target: 目前， algorithm = 'auto' 选择 'kd_tree' 如果\（K <N / 2 \）和 'effective_metric_' 是在 'VALID_METRICS' 列表 'kd_tree' 。它选择 'ball_tree' 如果\（K <N / 2 \）和 'effective_metric_' 是在 'VALID_METRICS' 列表 'ball_tree' 。它选择 'brute' 如果\（K <N / 2 \）和 'effective_metric_' 不在 'VALID_METRICS' 列表 'kd_tree' 或 'ball_tree' 。它选择 'brute' 如果\（k> = N / 2 \）。该选择基于以下假设：查询点的数量至少与训练点的数量相同，并且 leaf_size 接近其默认值 30 。

trans-unit.source: DBSCAN
trans-unit.target: DBSCAN

trans-unit.source: DBSCAN - Density-Based Spatial Clustering of Applications with Noise. Finds core samples of high density and expands clusters from them. Good for data which contains clusters of similar density.
trans-unit.target: DBSCAN-基于密度的带噪声应用空间聚类。查找高密度的核心样本,并从中扩展聚类。适用于包含类似密度聚类的数据。

trans-unit.source: DBSCAN eps parameter. Must be set to < max_eps. Results will be close to DBSCAN algorithm if eps and max_eps are close to one another.
trans-unit.target: DBSCAN eps 参数。必须设置为< max_eps 。如果 eps 和 max_eps 彼此接近，则结果将接近DBSCAN算法。

trans-unit.source: DCG orders the true targets (e.g. relevance of query answers) in the predicted order, then multiplies them by a logarithmic decay and sums the result. The sum can be truncated after the first \(K\) results, in which case we call it DCG@K. NDCG, or NDCG@K is DCG divided by the DCG obtained by a perfect prediction, so that it is always between 0 and 1. Usually, NDCG is preferred to DCG.
trans-unit.target: DCG按照预测的顺序对真正的目标(如查询答案的相关性)进行排序,然后将它们乘以对数衰减,并对结果进行求和。和值可以在第一个\(K/)结果后截断,在这种情况下,我们称之为DCG@K。NDCG,或NDCG@K是DCG除以完美预测得到的DCG,所以它总是在0和1之间。 通常,NDCG比DCG更受欢迎。

trans-unit.source: DIS weighted distances to five Boston employment centres
trans-unit.target: 综合安全分遣队与波士顿五个就业中心的加权距离。

trans-unit.source: D^2 is a generalization of the coefficient of determination R^2. R^2 uses squared error and D^2 deviance. Note that those two are equal for family='normal'.
trans-unit.target: D ^ 2是确定系数R ^ 2的概括。R ^ 2使用平方误差和D ^ 2偏差。请注意，对于 family='normal' ，这两个是相等的。

trans-unit.source: D^2 is defined as \(D^2 = 1-\frac{D(y_{true},y_{pred})}{D_{null}}\), \(D_{null}\) is the null deviance, i.e. the deviance of a model with intercept alone, which corresponds to \(y_{pred} = \bar{y}\). The mean \(\bar{y}\) is averaged by sample_weight. Best possible score is 1.0 and it can be negative (because the model can be arbitrarily worse).
trans-unit.target: D^2的定义为/(D^2=1-frac/D(y_{true},y_{pred})}{D_{null}}/),/(D_{null}/)为空偏差,即仅有截距的模型的偏差,对应于/(y_{pred}=\bar{y}/)。平均数 ⑴(bar{y}\)是由sample_weight平均的。最好的分数是1.0,可以是负数(因为模型可以任意变坏)。

trans-unit.source: D^2 of self.predict(X) w.r.t. y.
trans-unit.target: D^2 of self.predict(X)w.r.t.y.

trans-unit.source: Damping factor (between 0.5 and 1) is the extent to which the current value is maintained relative to incoming values (weighted 1 - damping). This in order to avoid numerical oscillations when updating these values (messages).
trans-unit.target: 阻尼系数(在0.5和1之间)是指当前值相对于输入值的维持程度(加权1-阻尼)。这是为了避免更新这些值(信息)时出现数字振荡。

trans-unit.source: Damping factor between 0.5 and 1.
trans-unit.target: 阻尼系数在0.5和1之间。

trans-unit.source: Decision function computed with out-of-bag estimate on the training set. If n_estimators is small it might be possible that a data point was never left out during the bootstrap. In this case, oob_decision_function_ might contain NaN.
trans-unit.target: 用训练集上的实际估计值计算的决策函数。如果n_estimators小，则有可能在引导过程中从未遗漏任何数据点。在这种情况下， oob_decision_function_ 可能包含NaN。

trans-unit.source: Decision function computed with out-of-bag estimate on the training set. If n_estimators is small it might be possible that a data point was never left out during the bootstrap. In this case, oob_decision_function_ might contain NaN. This attribute exists only when oob_score is True.
trans-unit.target: 在训练集上使用袋外估计值计算的决策函数。如果n_estimators很小，则有可能在引导过程中从未遗漏任何数据点。在这种情况下， oob_decision_function_ 可能包含NaN。仅当 oob_score 为True时，此属性才存在。

trans-unit.source: Decision function for the OneVsOneClassifier.
trans-unit.target: OneVsOneClassifier的决策函数。

trans-unit.source: Decision function of the samples. It is equal to the shifted Mahalanobis distances. The threshold for being an outlier is 0, which ensures a compatibility with other outlier detection algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 样本的决定函数。它等于移位的马哈兰诺比斯距离。成为离群值的阈值为0,这保证了与其他离群值检测算法的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Decision function values related to each class, per sample. In the two-class case, the shape is (n_samples,), giving the log likelihood ratio of the positive class.
trans-unit.target: 与每个类相关的决策函数值,每个样本。在两类情况下,形状为(n_samples,),给出正类的对数似然比。

trans-unit.source: Decision function values related to each class, per sample. In the two-class case, the shape is [n_samples,], giving the log likelihood ratio of the positive class.
trans-unit.target: 与每个类相关的决策函数值,每个样本。在两类情况下,形状为[n_samples,],给出正类的对数似然比。

trans-unit.source: Decision tree learners create biased trees if some classes dominate. It is therefore recommended to balance the dataset prior to fitting with the decision tree.
trans-unit.target: 如果某些类占主导地位,决策树学习器会创建有偏见的树。因此,建议在用决策树拟合之前对数据集进行平衡。

trans-unit.source: Decision trees can also be applied to regression problems, using the DecisionTreeRegressor class.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DecisionTreeRegressor 类，决策树也可以应用于回归问题。

trans-unit.source: Decision trees can be unstable because small variations in the data might result in a completely different tree being generated. This problem is mitigated by using decision trees within an ensemble.
trans-unit.target: 决策树可能是不稳定的,因为数据的微小变化可能会导致生成完全不同的树。通过在一个集合中使用决策树可以缓解这个问题。

trans-unit.source: Decision trees tend to overfit on data with a large number of features. Getting the right ratio of samples to number of features is important, since a tree with few samples in high dimensional space is very likely to overfit.
trans-unit.target: 决策树在具有大量特征的数据上倾向于过拟合。获得正确的样本与特征数的比例是很重要的,因为在高维空间中样本少的树很可能会过拟合。
